poses.title: Tree Pose 1
poses.script: Inhale, lift your hands to the the sky. Exhale, ground your feet to the top of your mat.

poses.title: Tree Pose 2
poses.script: Inhale, lift your hands to the the sky. Exhale, ground your feet to the top of your mat.

poses.title: Tree Pose 3
poses.script: Inhale, lift your hands to the the sky. Exhale, ground your feet to the top of your mat.

title: Flow Yoga
notes: Weekly lesson for Yoga Beginner (not-limited to students)

poses.title: Downward Dog Pose
poses.script: Starting on all fours, lifting the hips, and straightening the legs to form an inverted V.
